meanings.def: to remove something that has been written or printed, or that has been stored on a computer
examples: Your name has been deleted from the list.
This command deletes files from the directory.
The file had been accidentally deleted.
I deleted your last email by mistake—could you send it again?

meanings.def: a key or command on a computer, phone, etc. that removes text, records or images
examples: Just use delete to remove a specific record from the database.
If the caller asks for financial details, just hang up and press delete.
